name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
You may discard this card instead of spending up to $10.
Discard this card if you lose your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
You may discard this card instead of spending up to 3 Clue tokens.
Discard this card if you lose your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description: You may discard this card instead of losing your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
+1 Combat
When you pass a Combat check, you may disregard a monster's Overwhelming ability.
Discard this card if you lose your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
You may discard this card when you gain a Common Item.  If so, instead of drawing from the Common Item deck as normal, you may search the Common Item deck for any one item and take it.
Discard this card if you lose your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
Discard this card and choose one dimensional symbol other than the moon.  Return all monsters in Arkham with that dimensional symbol to the monster cup.
Discard this card if you lose your Blessing.

name: Blessing of Nodens
description: Remove one doom token from the doom track, then discard this card.

description:

description:

name: Blessing of Nodens
description:
+1 Spell
Any Phase: You may exhaust this card to refresh 1 Spell.(If this card is exhausted during the Upkeep Phase, it cannot be refreshed until the next Upkeep Phase.)
